title: The First Cocktail in London: Notes of a Human Guinea Pig
description: Frankie Drake falls in love with a clean and hot mouthed doctor (possibly or possibly not from Stockholm), and yet is he truly in love or is it just the drugs?In Part One of Notes of a Human Guinea Pig we witness Tom Conrad’s fictional alter ego, Frankie Drake, swallowing his very first cocktail of pills during a saucy and strange medical trial. Part One, essentially a short story, is an introduction to the strange world of “volunteers” being “paid” to be prodded, poked, and probed, and what's more possibly falling in love.PLEASE NOTE : Notes of a Human Guinea Pig is divided up into serialized installments. Part One is a short story, Part Two and Three, are somewhat longer (novella length). Each part focuses on central character Frankie Drake and his peculiar experiences being paid to... swallow .
author: Tom Conrad
